snippet: In a 23-minute speech on Wednesday, William C. Thompson Jr., a Democratic candidate for mayor of New York City,  laid out his vision for education.
abstract: William C Thompson, Democratic candidate for mayor of New York City, lays out vision for education in 23-minute speech at Kimmel Center at New York University; uses speech to draw distinctions between himself and Mayor Michael R Bloomberg, who narrowly beat him in 2009.
lead_paragraph: In a 23-minute speech on Wednesday, William C. Thompson Jr., a Democratic candidate for mayor of New York City,  laid out his vision for education.

headline.seo: Thompson Tries to Draw a Line Between Him and Bloomberg on Education
headline.main: On Education, Thompson Tries to Set Himself Apart
headline.print_headline: On Education, Thompson Tries to Set Himself Apart
